issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Hive cli will throw "Error evaluating hplsql" exception when i use the hplsql udf like "SELECT hplsql('hello[:1]', columnName) FROM tableName".
fields.summary: Hplsql UDF doesn't work in Hive Cli

comments.body: I see you created a Pull request on github with changes. Can you please a patch for Jira and attach it? Please contact me by email, I will tell you how to do that (if it is new to you).

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12806617/HIVE-13877.2.patch
